flawed_nl_solution:
In the first hour, it produces 60/6=<<60/6=10.0>>10.0 pots.
In the last hour, it produces 60/5=<<60/5=21.0>>21.0 pots.
21.0-10.0=<<21.0-10.0=11.0>>11.0 more pots are produced in the last hour.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12.0, not 21.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
